subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd is enjoying some of the best shooting days of his 13-year N.B.A. career, thanks in part to a game that allows him to act as if he were on the playground.
snippet: Jason Kidd is enjoying some of the best shooting days of his 13-year N.B.A. career, thanks in part to a game that allows him to act as if he were on the playground.
